product_name: Louis Garneau Equipe Bike Shorts - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Enjoy amazing fit on road or trail rides with the women's 10-panel, fast-drying Louis Garneau Equipe Bike Shorts. They offer the ultimate blend of muscle compression and moisture management. Compression nylon/spandex fabric wicks away moisture and dries fast. Airgel chamois has perforated gel inserts for comfort with ventilation. HuggFit waist is women-specific for comfort. Powerband compressive, nonchafing grippers. Ergonomic fit; nonchafing flatlock seams. Louis Garneau Equipe Bike Shorts have a back reflective logo. Closeout.
short_description: Enjoy amazing fit on road or trail rides with the women's 10-panel, fast-drying Louis Garneau Equipe Bike Shorts. They offer the ultimate blend of muscle compression and moisture management.
